aboutpara:
Iâ€™m a digital marketer with 2+ years of experience in SEO, web analytics, PPC advertising, and content creation, now actively transitioning into the data analytics field. My background has equipped me with strong analytical thinking, data-driven decision making, and hands-on experience with tools like Google Analytics 4 (GA4), Google Search Console, and various advertising platforms.

 To deepen my data skills, Iâ€™ve completed certifications in Google Data Analytics, Python, SQL, and Tableau, and Iâ€™m currently building end-to-end data analysis projects using Python (Pandas, NumPy), SQL, and Tableau to strengthen my portfolio. My passion lies in using data to uncover insights, optimize business performance, and support strategic decisions.



 Iâ€™m excited to apply my combined marketing and analytical experience to solve real-world business problems, whether in marketing analytics, product analytics, or general data analysis roles.

experiences.bullets: Provided high-quality Traditional Chinese translations for diverse projects, ensuring cultural and contextual accuracy.|Wrote engaging and coherent Traditional Chinese content, including short stories, marketing copy, and technical documentation.|Evaluated AI-generated Traditional Chinese text for factual accuracy, language fluency, and adherence to client requirements.|Ranked AI-generated responses based on their relevance, accuracy, and alignment with user intent.|Collaborated on improving AI models by providing detailed feedback and insights into Traditional Chinese linguistic nuances.
